name: Not Important
description:
Not Important is a rogue-like action survival game where your main goal is simple: survive for as long as possible and everything else is not important.

The game features perma-death, meaning that if you die, you have to start over.
It takes places in a single, ever-expanding level.

Dodge your enemies, obtain upgrades and survive for as long as possible.

Controls

  • Movement: wsad
  • Aiming: mouse
  • Roll: spacebar

Created by:  Matěj Gargula, Cyril Janeček, David Možný, Lukáš Zahradník
